article.title: Share Your Success Story - Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn how to share your exporting success story with the Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​​The Commercial Service must report to Congress each year to show that we work with real companies in real business situations. Reporting our performance lets us stay in business and continue to assist you!

Please emailDavid.Fiscus@trade.govand tell us about your company and your international success to assist us in our efforts to continually improve the quality and effectiveness of the various export assistance programs and services we offer companies in our area. The information you provide will remain confidential and will only be reported in aggregate with all successes from the country.​
article.seometadatatitle: Share Your Success Story - Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.seometadatadescription: Learn how to share your exporting success story with the Utah U.S. Export Assistance Center.
